DOC.brief_title: Combination Chemotherapy Plus Radiation Therapy Treating Patients With Anaplastic Astrocytoma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine efficacy carmustine , cisplatin , etoposide give prior radiotherapy patient anaplastic astrocytoma . II . Assess toxic effect associate regimen patient . III . Evaluate regimen term fatigue , depression , excessive daytime somnolence , quality life patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive carmustine IV 1 hour day 1-3 , oral etoposide day 1-21 29-49 , cisplatin IV 1-2 hour day 1-3 29-31 . Treatment repeat every 8 week 3 course . Patients receive radiotherapy concurrently third course chemotherapy . Quality life assess every 4 month 1 year , every 6 month 4 year , annually 5 year . Patients follow every 3 month 5 year annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 28 patient accrue study within 20 month .
